Helper function for build mode

Source: R/pipeline.R
run_build_mode.Rd

Helper function for build mode

Usage

run_build_mode(seurat_object, kegg_file, output_dir, progress, pb, verbose)

Value

A list containing the complete results of BUILD mode analysis:

seurat_object

Seurat object with predictions and evaluation metadata

models

List containing trained direct and SVM classification models

evaluation_results

List with accuracy metrics, confusion matrices, and performance statistics

plots

Named list of generated visualization plots

fingerprints

Matrix of calculated transcriptomic fingerprints for each culture condition

pathway_activities

Matrix of pathway activity scores used for training

Examples

# \donttest{
# Example requires prepared data files
# result <- run_build_mode(data_dir = "path/to/data",
#                         experiment_id = "exp1",
#                         output_dir = tempdir())
# }
# \donttest{
# Example requires reference data and query data
# result <- run_predict_mode(ref_data_dir = "path/to/ref",
#                           query_data_dir = "path/to/query",
#                           output_dir = tempdir())
# }
